sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE Configuration(
`Enable Latency Measurements` INTEGER, `Maximum Latency Threshold (ms)` DOUBLE,
`Enable Out-Of-Sequence Measurements` INTEGER, `Maximum Out-Of-Sequence Threshold` INTEGER )

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 11672
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Options to enable or disable latency measurements. When disabled, the Maximum Latency Threshold value shall be ignored

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 11673
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Expected maximum latency the test must meet for the test to pass

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 4465
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Option to enable or disable out of sequence measurements. When disabled, the Maximum Out Of SequenceThreshold value shall be ignored

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 4466
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Expected maximum out of sequence count the test must meet for the test to pass

Children.Name: Update Rx Frame Count temp table in Summary

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Update Rx Frame Count temp table in Summary

sql_statement.static: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS MethRfc2544_ValidRxFrameIterTemp
SELECT
group_concat((SELECT oIter.FrameSize WHERE oIter.TagName = 'framesize_objectIterator')) AS FrameSize,
group_concat((SELECT oIter.CurrVal WHERE oIter.TagName = 'rate_objectIterator')) AS FrameRate,
group_concat((SELECT oIter.Iteration WHERE oIter.TagName = 'rate_objectIterator')) AS Iteration,

(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN RxRes.IsExpectedPort=1 THEN RxRes.FrameCount ELSE 0 END) AS 'RxFrameCount' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxRes, StreamBlock AS Sb WHERE Sb.Handle = RxRes.ParentStreamBlock ORDER BY RxRes.Id) AS x WHERE x.RxFrameCount > 0) AS ValidRxCount

FROM (SELECT spirent_methodology_ObjectIteratorCommand.DataSetId AS DataSetId, spirent_methodology_ObjectIteratorCommand.CurrVal AS FrameSize, spirent_methodology_ObjectIteratorCommand.CurrVal AS CurrVal, spirent_methodology_ObjectIteratorCommand.Iteration AS Iteration, Tag.Name AS TagName FROM spirent_methodology_ObjectIteratorCommand, Tag, (SELECT SourceHnd, TargetHnd FROM RelationTable WHERE Type=='UserTag') AS UserTagTable WHERE spirent_methodology_ObjectIteratorCommand.Handle == UserTagTable.SourceHnd AND Tag.Handle == UserTagTable.TargetHnd AND Tag.Name IN ('rate_objectIterator', 'framesize_objectIterator')) AS oIter
SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MethRfc2544_ValidRxFrameIterTemp WHERE ValidRxCount > 0) == 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethRfc2544RxFrameTable(ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, FrameSize INT, FrameRate INT, Iteration INT, ValidRxCount INT)
SELECT FrameSize, FrameRate, Iteration, ValidRxCount FROM MethRfc2544_ValidRxFrameIterTemp

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT ValidRxCount AS 'Valid Rx Count' FROM MethRfc2544_ValidRxFrameIterTemp) == 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

sql_statement.static: SELECT FrameSize AS 'Frame Size', FrameRate AS 'Frame Rate', ValidRxCount AS 'Valid Rx Count' FROM MethRfc2544_ValidRxFrameIterTemp

report.display_name: Iteration Frame Results - Analyzer Detected Frames

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: No frames were detected by the Analyzer
report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Packets were detected by the Analyzer

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NoPacketTemp WHERE "Rx Stream Results Detected" = 'FALSE') > 0 THEN 0 WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NoPacketTemp WHERE "Undetected Frame Count" > 0) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

sql_statement.static: SELECT (CASE WHEN (SELECT SigFrameCount FROM RxEotStreamResults) IS NULL THEN 'FALSE' ELSE 'TRUE' END) AS 'Rx Stream Results Detected', COUNT(*) AS 'Undetected Frame Count' FROM (SELECT Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', Sb.PercentageLoad AS 'Load (%)',
ROUND(100.0 * DroppedFrameCount / (SigFrameCount + DroppedFrameCount - DuplicateFrameCount)) AS 'Frame Loss', DroppedFrameCount AS 'Dropped Frames',

SigFrameCount + DroppedFrameCount - DuplicateFrameCount AS 'Total Frames', CASE WHEN RxRes.IsExpectedPort=1 THEN RxRes.SigFrameCount ELSE 0 END as 'SigFrameCount', TxRes.PortName AS 'Tx Port', RxRes.PortName AS 'Rx Port' FROM
RxEotStreamResults AS RxRes JOIN TxEotStreamResults AS TxRes JOIN Streamblock AS Sb ON RxRes.ParentStreamBlock = TxRes.ParentStreamblock AND TxRes.ParentStreamblock = Sb.Handle AND SigFrameCount = 0)

report.display_name: Iteration Frame Results - Frame Loss Threshold Validation

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ThresholdTemp WHERE "Rx Stream Results Detected" = 'FALSE') > 0 THEN 0 WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ThresholdTemp WHERE "Threshold Exceeded Count" > 0) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

sql_statement.static: SELECT (CASE WHEN (SELECT SigFrameCount FROM RxEotStreamResults WHERE IsExpectedPort=1) IS NULL THEN 'FALSE' ELSE 'TRUE' END) AS 'Rx Stream Results Detected', COUNT(*) AS 'Threshold Exceeded Count' FROM (SELECT Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)',
Sb.PercentageLoad AS 'Load (%)', ROUND(100.0 * DroppedFrameCount / (SigFrameCount + DroppedFrameCount - DuplicateFrameCount)) AS 'Frame Loss', DroppedFrameCount AS 'Dropped Frames',
SigFrameCount + DroppedFrameCount - DuplicateFrameCount AS 'Total Frames', TxRes.PortName AS 'Tx Port', RxRes.PortName AS 'Rx Port' FROM
RxEotStreamResults AS RxRes JOIN TxEotStreamResults AS TxRes JOIN Streamblock AS Sb ON RxRes.ParentStreamBlock = TxRes.ParentStreamblock AND TxRes.ParentStreamblock = Sb.Handle AND "Frame Loss" >

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethRfc2544FrameLossIterations ('FrameSize' INTEGER, 'Load' FLOAT, 'FrameLoss' FLOAT, 'DroppedFrameCount' INTEGER, 'TotalFrameCount' INTEGER, 'TxPort' VARCHAR, 'RxPort' VARCHAR)

SELECT Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'FrameSize', Sb.PercentageLoad AS 'Load', CASE WHEN IsExpectedPort=1 THEN (ROUND(100.0 * DroppedFrameCount / (SigFrameCount + DroppedFrameCount - DuplicateFrameCount))) ELSE 100.0 END AS 'FrameLoss', DroppedFrameCount AS 'DroppedFrameCount', CASE WHEN IsExpectedPort=1 THEN (SigFrameCount + DroppedFrameCount - DuplicateFrameCount) ELSE 0 END AS 'TotalFrameCount', TxRes.PortName AS 'TxPort', RxRes.PortName AS 'RxPort' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxRes JOIN TxEotStreamResults AS TxRes JOIN Streamblock AS Sb ON RxRes.ParentStreamBlock = TxRes.ParentStreamblock AND TxRes.ParentStreamblock = Sb.Handle

sql_for_command_verdict.static: select case when `Enable Latency Measurements` = 1  then 1 else 0 end from Configuration
select case when `Enable Out-Of-Sequence Measurements` = 1  then 1 else 0 end from Configuration

Children.Name: Save Trial Latency and OOS Detail

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Save Trial Latency and OOS Detail

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Configuration ('Enable Latency Measurements', 'Maximum Latency Threshold (ms)', 'Enable Out-Of-Sequence Measurements', 'Maximum Out-Of-Sequence Threshold')
select * from Configuration

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethSummaryDetails ('Location', 'Port Group', 'Frame Size (bytes)', 'Load (%)', 'FrameLoss (%)', 'Min Latency (ns)', 'Avg Latency (ns)', 'Max Latency (ns)', 'Expected Max Latency (ns)', 'Out Of Sequence', 'Expected Max OOS', 'Result')

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethIterationDetails ('Location', 'Port Group', 'Frame Size (bytes)', 'Load (%)', 'FrameLoss (%)', 'Min Latency (ns)', 'Avg Latency (ns)', 'Max Latency (ns)', 'Expected Max Latency (ns)', 'Out Of Sequence', 'Expected Max OOS', 'Result')

SELECT Location, substr(Port.Name, 0, 16) as 'Port Group', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS `Frame Size (bytes)`, Sb.PercentageLoad AS `Load (%)`, CASE WHEN IsExpectedPort=1 THEN (ROUND(100.0 * DroppedFrameCount / (SigFrameCount + DroppedFrameCount - DuplicateFrameCount))) ELSE 100.0 END AS `FrameLoss (%)`, round(MinLatency * 1000, 2) as `Min Latency (ns)`, round(AvgLatency * 1000, 2) as `Avg Latency (ns)`, round(MaxLatency * 1000, 2) as `Max Latency (ns)`, (select `Maximum Latency Threshold (ms)` from Configuration) * 1000 * 1000 as `Expected Max Latency (ns)`, OutSeqFrameCount as `Out Of Sequence`, (select `Maximum Out-Of-Sequence Threshold` from Configuration) as `Expected Max OOS`, case when round(MaxLatency * 1000, 2) > (select `Maximum Latency Threshold (ms)` from Configuration) * 1000 * 1000 OR OutSeqFrameCount > (select `Maximum Out-Of-Sequence Threshold` from Configuration) then 'FAIL' else 'PASS' end as 'Result' from Port, Analyzer, RxEotStreamResults AS RxRes, Streamblock AS Sb where Port.Handle = Analyzer.ParentHnd and Analyzer.ParentHnd = RxRes.ParentHnd and RxRes.ParentStreamBlock = Sb.Handle
select * from MethIterationDetails

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Both of max latency and out of sequence count meet the threshold.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Max latency or out of sequence count exceeds the threshold.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM MethIterationDetails WHERE Result = 'FAIL') > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Configuration ('Enable Latency Measurements', 'Maximum Latency Threshold (ms)', 'Enable Out-Of-Sequence Measurements', 'Maximum Out-Of-Sequence Threshold')
select * from Configuration

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethSummaryDetails ('Location', 'Port Group', 'Frame Size (bytes)', 'Load (%)', 'FrameLoss (%)', 'Min Latency (ns)', 'Avg Latency (ns)', 'Max Latency (ns)', 'Expected Max Latency (ns)', 'Result')

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethIterationDetails ('Location', 'Port Group', 'Frame Size (bytes)', 'Load (%)', 'FrameLoss (%)', 'Min Latency (ns)', 'Avg Latency (ns)', 'Max Latency (ns)', 'Expected Max Latency (ns)', 'Result')

SELECT Location, substr(Port.Name, 0, 16) as 'Port Group', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS `Frame Size (bytes)`, Sb.PercentageLoad AS `Load (%)`, CASE WHEN IsExpectedPort=1 THEN (ROUND(100.0 * DroppedFrameCount / (SigFrameCount + DroppedFrameCount - DuplicateFrameCount))) ELSE 100.0 END AS 'FrameLoss (%)', round(MinLatency * 1000, 2) as `Min Latency (ns)`, round(AvgLatency * 1000, 2) as `Avg Latency (ns)`, round(MaxLatency * 1000, 2) as `Max Latency (ns)`, (select `Maximum Latency Threshold (ms)` from Configuration) * 1000 * 1000 as `Expected Max Latency (ns)`, case when round(MaxLatency * 1000, 2) > (select `Maximum Latency Threshold (ms)` from Configuration) * 1000 * 1000 then 'FAIL' else 'PASS' end as 'Result' from Port, Analyzer, RxEotStreamResults AS RxRes, Streamblock AS Sb where Port.Handle = Analyzer.ParentHnd and Analyzer.ParentHnd = RxRes.ParentHnd and RxRes.ParentStreamBlock = Sb.Handle
select * from MethIterationDetails

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM MethIterationDetails WHERE Result = 'FAIL') > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

select case when `Enable Out-Of-Sequence Measurements` = 1  then 1 else 0 end from Configuration

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Configuration ('Enable Latency Measurements', 'Maximum Latency Threshold (ms)', 'Enable Out-Of-Sequence Measurements', 'Maximum Out-Of-Sequence Threshold')
select * from Configuration
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethSummaryDetails ('Location', 'Port Group', 'Frame Size (bytes)', 'Load (%)', 'FrameLoss (%)', 'Out Of Sequence', 'Expected Max OOS', 'Result')
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethIterationDetails ('Location', 'Port Group', 'Frame Size (bytes)', 'Load (%)', 'FrameLoss (%)', 'Out Of Sequence', 'Expected Max OOS', 'Result')

SELECT Location, substr(Port.Name, 0, 16) as 'Port Group', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS `Frame Size (bytes)`, Sb.PercentageLoad AS `Load (%)`, CASE WHEN IsExpectedPort=1 THEN (ROUND(100.0 * DroppedFrameCount / (SigFrameCount + DroppedFrameCount - DuplicateFrameCount))) ELSE 100.0 END AS `FrameLoss (%)`, OutSeqFrameCount as `Out Of Sequence`, (select `Maximum Out-Of-Sequence Threshold` from Configuration) as `Expected Max OOS`, case when OutSeqFrameCount > (select `Maximum Out-Of-Sequence Threshold` from Configuration) then 'FAIL' else 'PASS' end as 'Result' from Port, Analyzer, RxEotStreamResults AS RxRes, Streamblock AS Sb where Port.Handle = Analyzer.ParentHnd and Analyzer.ParentHnd = RxRes.ParentHnd and RxRes.ParentStreamBlock = Sb.Handle
select * from MethIterationDetails

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Out Of Sequence count exceeds the threshold.

) WHERE "Load (%)"=

AND FrameSize=
) WHERE "Load (%)"=

MethRfc2544FrameLossIterations ORDER BY FrameSize
